description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the secure boot security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-37973), users should apply the relevant security updates.

1. Identify your Windows version and build number corresponding to the update you need.

2. Download and install the following updates from the official Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
   - For Windows 10 (x64 and 32-bit): [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)

**Details**:
This update addresses a vulnerability that could allow a security feature bypass through uncontrolled recursion, ensuring that secure boot operations are not compromised.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is backed up before proceeding with any updates.
- Verify system compatibility with the respective update for your Windows version.
